ISSUE.TITLE: feat: As a user, I want to configure consumer_group_id in consumer-restriction plugin, so that we can limit consumers by group_id
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ### Description Hello, I found that we don't support configuring `consumer_group_id` in [consumer-restriction](https://apisix.apache.org/docs/apisix/plugins/consumer-restriction/) plugins. I think we can support configuring `consumer_group_id` in this plugin so that we can limit consumers by group id; it will be easier for users. refer: https://apisix.apache.org/docs/apisix/plugins/consumer-restriction/ https://apisix.apache.org/docs/apisix/admin-api/#consumer-group
